aboutMe.title: about me
aboutMe.item1: My professional experience in IT took off when I finished the course at the center, www.espai.es.
aboutMe.item2: After completing the course, I earned a degree in Communications and Networks Technician, Computer Equipment Maintenance, and this was complemented by my studies at ITAcademy and my participation in the projects IT-Academy-BCN/ita-wiki-frontend and IT-Academy-BCN/ita-profiles, on which I worked for six months.
aboutMe.item3: I followed the clean code practices and agile methodologies of most companies in the sector. I helped 13 developers, in which I contributed, introducing those who have been joining to the development process.
aboutMe.item4: Tot i que la meva experiència professional en l'àmbit de la informàtica no és gaire, puc aportar ganes d'aprendre i interès. M'agrada la feina ben feta.
